item.title: Qubes OS, a Xen based Desktop OS
item.description: Security by Isolation More info: https://www.qubes-os.org/ | http://qubesosmamapaxpa.onion/ Not Linux Runs multiple instances of Linux Single User system dom0 stays offline One VM for this, One VM for that. Support for Fedora, Debian, and Whonix VMs Give it a try!
